Name: Futanari of the Amazon
About the game: You are on an expedition in the legendary Amazon jungle. Your team has been tasked with exploring an unknown area. You end up wandering off only to be captured by a tribe of futanari Amazonians. Find out what exactly it is, that these strange beings want from you. Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions. Gameplay Kinetic Visual Novel H-Scenes ~10K words
